signals.problem_statement: The customer needs automation to assign emails to different departments based on the content of the emails.
signals.customer_ask: We might need some automations plus AI to automatically transfer emails to the appropriate group.
signals.context: Operations team handling customer emails related to airline services.

signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks a feature to automatically notify team leads when SLA breaches occur.
signals.customer_ask: Do we have an option to escalate that particular email directly to the team leader?
signals.context: Operations team managing multiple email groups.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires a feature that allows agents to see pending emails immediately after closing a ticket.
signals.customer_ask: I want the new ticket to open in my screen as soon as I resolve one.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for AI capabilities to track SLA breaches and provide real-time reporting.
signals.customer_ask: If you have any automations to track our SLA breaches and the current reports.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a writing assistance feature to help agents with grammatical errors in emails.
signals.customer_ask: If you have that feature already with you guys, that will be very helpful for us.
